title: Rich
lyrics:
Don't need no pearls or your golden rhinestone
Your hotshot things or more diamond rings
I'm sick and tired of your bullshit games
Are you chasing fame, how you act all fake
All I want is your heart and bones

Wanna get up close with you

Baby give me something real and true

I just want to be with you



If you wanna move on with me

Just gotta show me something real, something I can't resist

If you wanna get down with me

Just gotta give me something real and baby we'll be rich

I can't resist, something that I can't resist

Just show me this feeling that I've always missed

If you wanna get down with me

Just gotta give me something real and baby we'll be rich



You flash your visa and your platinum card

But you ain't that smart if you think I'm charmed

Didn't your mama ever tell you that

You don't need no cash just to make love last



All I want is your heart and bones

Wanna get up close with you

Baby give me something real and true

I just want to be with you



If you wanna move on with me

Just gotta show me something real, something I can't resist

If you wanna get down with me

Just gotta give me something real and baby we'll be rich

I can't resist, something that I can't resist

Just show me this feeling that I've always missed

If you wanna get down with me

Just gotta give me something real and baby we'll be rich



If you wanna be mine like this

You need to open up your heart like (ooh)

If you're gonna get down like this

Fight to make me go high like (ooh)



If you wanna move on with me

Just gotta show me something real, something I can't resist

If you wanna get down with me

Just gotta give me something real and baby we'll be rich

I can't resist, something that I can't resist

Just show me this feeling that I've always missed

If you wanna get down with me

Just gotta give me something real and baby we'll be rich
